prosper.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if people or businesses prosper, they grow and develop in a successful way, especially by becoming rich or making a large profit
prosper.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Businesses across the state are prospering.
prosper.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to be successful and become rich
prosper.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: As families prosper, consumer demand for meat increases.
With hard work and long hours, our business prospered.
